document_data.name: ''The Skirling Skull''
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Skirling Skull''''' was unique [[enchanted]] [[flail]] of [[svirfneblin]] make from the vast [[Underdark]].
document_data.Description: ''The Skirling Skull's'' design was unusual, even for its deep gnome creators. It had a {{SI|3'|'"|long=yes}} long [[wood]]en haft with its head made of carved stone to resemble a skull with impossibly long shards of dark crystal protruding out of it.
document_data.Powers: With each strike, the crystal spikes vibrated, emitting a keening wail. This magical harmonics possessed the ability to penetrate and ''[[Dispel magic|dispel]]'' active magical effects and [[spell]]s from the target and had a chance to [[deaf]]en them as well as the wielder.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1312}}, ''The Skirling Skull'' was wielded by [[Harhord Dorm]], a duergar bodyguard of [[Barud Barzam]], who was placed in charge of an old duergar stronghold in the [[River Caves]], where the [[Black Raven River]] emerged and ran south in [[Northwest Faerûn]].
